content: this pattern is available for free on my blog http //snappy-tots com/free-pattern-lucys-blanket/ but this is great if you would like an ad-free pdf to download **materials** yarn two big skeins 440 yards bernat blanket stripes 100 yards of contrasting yarn to finish border crochet hooks m/n 9mm miscellaneous yarn needle for weaving in ends **details** finished measurements 34 square or desired length the pattern is written for a baby blanket instructions included to make any size blanket from any weight yarn _______________ email help is available with each pattern purchase please follow snappy tots on your favorites social media sites for giveaways new release announcements events and fun facebook 1 pinterest 2 instagram 3 twitter 4 please check out my other patterns ~ featured sale patterns of the week 8 ~ the rest of my shop for over 500 patterns shop now 5 join my facebook group totally snappy 9 for specials events sneak peeks and giveaways if you have any questions comments or suggestions please send me an email 7 _______________ copyright ©2018 snappy tots aka heidi yates no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in part or whole by any means without written permission graphics and pattern in part and whole may not be used for personal or profit finished products created from this pattern may be sold please include reference to snappy-tots com as pattern source when possible 1 https //www facebook com/snappytots 2 https //www pinterest com/snappytots/ 3 https //www instagram com/snappytots/ 4 https //twitter com/snappytots 5 http //shop snappy-tots com 7 mailto heidi@snappy-tots com 8 http //www ravelry com/bundles/specials 9 https //www facebook com/groups/totallysnappy/
